import { useState } from "react"; const Form = ()=>{ const [form, setForm] = useState({ name:"", weight:"", height:"", life_span:"", temperament:[], image:"" }) const changeHandler = (event) => { const property = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; setForm({ ...form, [property]: value }); }; const weightHandler = (event) => { const property = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; const min = []; const max = []; if(property === "min"){ max.push(value) } }; const heightHandler = (event) => {}; const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); //! Asi no recarga la pag cuando tocamos enter }; return(
